\subsection{Detailed Description}
Commonly used routines in poski\-\_\-\-Partition\-Handler's routines. \begin{DoxyAttention}{Attention}
These routines are usually for the library's internal use and should not normally be called directly by users. 

Called by \hyperlink{poski__PartitionHandler_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Partition\-Handler.\-c}
\end{DoxyAttention}
Also, refer \hyperlink{poski__Partition__OneD_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Partition\-\_\-\-One\-D.\-c}, \hyperlink{poski__Partition__SemiOneD_8c}{poski\-\_\-\-Partition\-\_\-\-Semi\-One\-D.\-c}
